page.title: 14The Veterinary Surgery
page.content: The surgery has been opened on the estate because most of the people who live there have pets. Most of the patients are dogs and cats but they have treated a jackdaw and a snake. The lady who we interviewed there said that she liked her job because she could help animals that are suffering but that it was very sad when they had to put animals down. The surgery has been opened for one year now. The worst disease that they have treated is leukaemia which one dog suffered from. The most popular breed of dog in the area is the labrador.
